question: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has approved how much amount for lining project of the Son canal in Shahabad â€“ Bhojpur region of Bihar?
explanation: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has approved Lining Project of Son Canal in Shahbad-Bhojpur region of Bihar, which would benefit the agriculture sector immensely in the region. The estimated cost of this project is USD $503 million out of which US $352 million is being provided by ADB. This project on completion will bring immense benefits to agriculture sector of Shahbad-Bhojpur region of Bihar.
